rye.opener: Ugh, I’m so close to finishing this basket but I’m almost out of blue rye fibers!
rye.request: Please find some for me so I can finish this faster. I will trade you with something really cool!
rye.closer: The object? I heard it was made of a rare rock, something I’ve never seen before. The color looks a bit like wood or acorn…
rye.seal: Oh the cool thing? Well, I heard the chief found something in the forest earlier today. No one knows what it is but it is quite shiny. It looks like a small part of something bigger.

shells.opener: Oh hey, no need to panic! These fires are 100% controlled. We’re just burning the land so new shoots grow and lure in game.
shells.request: You’re looking for some blue rye? You’re in luck! We just harvested this today. I’ll trade it for some clam shells.
shells.closer: Ooh I can’t believe you got 5 clam shells that quickly, impressive! Here’s the rye fibers, as promised.

net.opener: Man, fishing sure is hard. I’m not used to this bone harpoon. Maybe a net would work better? I saw some back in the village.
net.request: Thanks for the help! I surely can catch some salmon now. Here, take some clam shells as my token of gratitude.
net.closer: The object? I heard it was made of a rare rock, something I’ve never seen before. The color looks a bit like wood or acorn…

vines.opener: Oh this? This is the village dance house! We are about to have our annual Kuksa to bring good health and bountiful hunt to our village.
vines.request: Would you please find me some more oak and grapevines? I need a few more supports.
vines.closer: Amazing, thank you! We can definitely finish this by sundown. The chief? He’s inside here. I saw him holding something earlier. Could it be an offering from the earth itself bringing wealth to our village?
